app_descript:
App Name: Vault

App Package Name: com.netqin.ps

Brief:

Vault is a robust mobile app designed for individuals who value their privacy and security. It provides a suite of tools to ensure your personal photos and videos are well protected against unauthorized access. Cloud backup and data transfer capabilities ensure your data is safe and easily transferrable, while stealth features and break-in alerts keep prying eyes at bay. Vault is a valuable tool for keeping your private data truly private.
